#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        int i,t,c,n;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
                cin>>n;
                i=2;
                c=1;
                n=n-1;
                while(n--)
                {
                    if(c%2==1)
                    i=i*2-1;
                    else
                    i=i*2+1;
                    c++;
                }
                cout<<i<<endl;
        }
}
